mapper.select: select t.id, t.followid, t.wxid, wu.wxid followWxId, wu.nickname followName, wu.avatarUrl path , t.createtime from t_e_follow t left join weixin_user wu on t.followid = wu.id where t.wxid = #{wxid} and t.followtype = 1 order by t.createtime desc limit 0,4

select t.id, t.followid, t.wxid, teai.attribute followAttribute, teai.name followName, t.createtime from t_e_follow t left join t_e_auction_item teai on t.followid = teai.id where t.wxid = #{wxid} and t.followtype = 2 order by t.createtime desc limit 0,4

select t.id, t.followid, t.wxid ,tea.name followName, t.createtime from t_e_follow t left join t_e_auction tea on t.followid = tea.id where t.wxid = #{wxid} and t.followtype = 3 order by t.createtime desc limit 0,4
